QuestData.Title: Lunk's Adventure: Cranky Little Dwarfs
QuestData.Description: What you doing? Why you kill?$b$bYou need to get things from dwarfs? Ah, Lunk understand. Lunk have a better way.$b$bListen: you go fight dwarf, but do not kill! Just fight until dwarf get tired. Then Lunk will help dwarf fall asleep. Dwarfs probably just cranky because they don't get sleep.$b$bCome on! Trust Lunk.
QuestData.LogDescription: Weaken 7 Dark Iron Steamsmiths so Lunk can help them fall asleep.
QuestData.RewardText: Dwarfs is going to sleep good tonight.$b$bLunk hopes you got everything you were looking for. Now time to go off and find other adventures.$b$bBye!

Objectives.Objective: Dark Iron Steamsmiths put to sleep
